name: Storage Mounts
description: Ensures all Proxmox storage mounts are available.
check_cmd: grep -vE 'cgroup|proc|sysfs|tmpfs' /etc/fstab | awk '{print $2}' | while read m; do mountpoint -q $m || echo $m; done
fix_cmd: grep -vE 'cgroup|proc|sysfs|tmpfs' /etc/fstab | awk '{print $2}' | while read m; do mount $m 2>/dev/null || true; done
verify_cmd: grep -vE 'cgroup|proc|sysfs|tmpfs' /etc/fstab | awk '{print $2}' | while read m; do mountpoint -q $m || echo $m; done
